EmailTemplate.subject: Happy New Year from TCS!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey {!Contact.Name},
A big Happy New Year from the TCS Team to all of our amazing Grads! What a better way to kick-start 2016 than to get involved in all our TCS opportunities! From joining CAT Teams and receiving money to fund your own projects to getting involved and helping with our NCS Programme, there are lots of opportunities for you as a grad to get involved in! Read below for all opportunities.
CORE OPPORTUNITIES AND EVENTS
Training for Youth Assessors will take place on the 20th Jan, 15th Feb, or the 19th Feb at The Challenge office in Waterloo.
If you didn't sign up and are interested, register here! The deadline to apply for this role is Wednesday 13th January.
Training dates for Sales Ambassadors are below: 20th Jan, 27th Jan and _____ We will send you another email soon with more info!
If you didn't sign up and are interested, register here! The deadline to apply for this role is Wednesday 13th January. LOCAL OPPORTUNITIES AND EVENTS
Want to be part of a CAT Team (Challenge Action Team) and get involved in some amazing projects to help benefit your community? You could be funded up to Â£500 to run your own project! Sign up here!
Want to get involved with Bite the Ballot and become an accredited Changemaker? You'll learn loads of new skills, including campaign planning, effective social media, political advocacy, and so many more! Get your tickets for Thursday 14th Jan in Waterloo OR Friday 15th Jan in Kentish Town. Please order tickets for only ONE date that is best suitable for you. Calling all Grad Reps!
